page.title: 18Local News in Meltham
page.content:
We studied{'The Huddersfield Daily {Examiner'}for news about{Meltham}for one week in{June 1985.
{10/6/1985 80 to Lose Jobs} 80 men at Case International are to lose their job's because they are abandoning the bulk of it's design and development work at{Meltham.
{11/6/1985 Oil Strike} Oil men are hoping to strike it rich in the{Huddersfield}area. Tests are being done in the{Meltham}area to discover if there could be some oil or gas.
{13/6/1985 Vicar to Retire} Canon Peter Spivey is to retire after 25 years as vicar of St. Batholomews Church,{Meltham.
